Text: I know I'm going to get an angry mob after me for saying this, but I would really like to know why people stuff these small files that are clearly not HD into the highres section? Standard dvdrip quality takes about 175 MB for 20 minutes and 720p about 450-600 MB. So why are many uploaders flooding the HD section with videos that don't belong there? And yes, I know its free but its not an excuse to label things in a way that misguides people. What's the point of having categories they don't mean anything?
